Nominee: Gregory B. Jaczko, of the District of Columbia, to be a Member of the Nuclear Regulatory Commission for the term of five years expiring June 30, 2008, vice Greta Joy Dicus, term expired.
actions: Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Reported by Senator Inhofe, Committee on Environment and Public Works, without printed report.
Placed on Senate Executive Calendar. Calendar No. 667. Subject to nominee's commitment to respond to requests to appear and testify before any duly constituted committee of the Senate.
Confirmed by the Senate by Voice Vote.
